page.title: Privacy Policy
page.subtitle: Your data privacy matters
page.description: Comprehensive data protection and transparency standards
page.intro: Time 2 Trade is committed to transparency about how we collect, use, and protect your data. This policy explains what information we gather, why we need it, how we use it, and the choices you have.

provided.title: Information you provide
items: Email address (for authentication and account recovery)
Display name and profile photo (optional)
Trading session preferences and clock settings
Economic calendar favorites and personal notes
Timezone selection and display preferences

automatic.title: Information we collect automatically
items: IP address and general location (country/region)
Device type, browser type, and operating system
Session data and authentication tokens
Usage statistics (pages viewed, features used, session duration)
Error logs and diagnostic information

thirdParty.title: Information from third parties
items: OAuth profile data (name, email, profile photo) when you sign in with Google or Twitter
Economic calendar data from JBlanked API (publicly available market events)

blog.title: Blog and public content
items: Blog articles are publicly available and do not require authentication
Reading blog posts does not collect personal data (no tracking of blog readers)
If you create an account, your clock and calendar data is stored (blog access requires no account)
Blog pages display Google AdSense ads (context-based, not personalized unless you allow cookies)
Blog content is indexed by search engines for discoverability

provide.title: Provide and maintain services
items: Authenticate your account and maintain secure sessions
Sync your preferences and settings across devices
Display economic calendar events in your selected timezone
Store your favorites, notes, and custom configurations

improve.title: Improve and develop features
items: Analyze usage patterns to optimize performance
Identify and fix bugs and technical issues
Develop new features based on user behavior
Ensure service reliability and uptime

advertising.title: Advertising
items: Display Google AdSense advertisements
Measure ad performance and effectiveness
Deliver personalized ads when you allow them via cookie consent
Show non-personalized ads when you select essential-only cookies

providers.title: Service providers
items: Firebase Authentication (Google Cloud) - for account management
Cloud Firestore (Google Cloud) - for data storage in us-central1 region
Firebase Hosting (Google Cloud) - for application delivery via global CDN
Firebase Cloud Functions (Google Cloud) - for scheduled data synchronization
JBlanked API - for economic calendar data retrieval (no personal data shared)

advertising.title: Advertising partners
items: Google AdSense - may collect and use data for ad delivery when you allow personalized ads
Manage ad preferences at Google Ad Settings: https://adssettings.google.com

advertisingBlog.title: Blog advertising
items: Blog pages contain Google AdSense display ads and in-article ads for revenue
Ads are placed after blog post content to avoid disrupting reading experience
Ads are context-based (related to economic news and trading) when no personalized data is available
Non-personalized ads are shown when you choose essential-only cookies
Ad performance is monitored to ensure compliance with Google AdSense policies

legal.title: Legal requirements
items: We may disclose information to comply with legal obligations, court orders, or government requests
We do not sell your personal data to third parties

access.title: Access and update
items: View and edit your profile information in account settings
Update display name, photo, and preferences at any time
Request a copy of your data via @time2_trade on X (Twitter)

delete.title: Delete your data
items: Delete your account in settings (removes all personal data and preferences)
Contact @time2_trade on X (Twitter) to request account deletion
We process deletion requests within 30 days
Some data may be retained in backup systems for up to 90 days

cookies.title: Cookie preferences
items: Use the cookie banner to choose between personalized ads or essential-only mode
Change consent at any time by clearing browser data to reset the banner
Essential cookies are always active to maintain authentication and settings

ads.title: Ad personalization
items: Control Google ad personalization at Google Ad Settings: https://adssettings.google.com
Choose essential-only cookies to receive non-personalized ads only
Ad choices do not affect Time 2 Trade functionality

portability.title: Data portability
items: Request export of your settings and favorites in JSON format
Contact @time2_trade on X (Twitter) with your request
We provide data exports within 30 days

retention.heading: Data retention and deletion
items: Account data: Stored while your account is active, plus 30 days after deletion request
Settings and preferences: Deleted immediately upon account deletion
Usage logs: Retained for 90 days for debugging and security monitoring
Error logs: Retained for 180 days for system stability analysis
Backup systems: Data may persist in backups for up to 90 days after deletion
Legal holds: Data subject to legal preservation requirements may be retained longer

security.heading: Security measures
items: Encryption: All data transmitted using TLS 1.2+ encryption
Storage: Data encrypted at rest using Google Cloud encryption standards
Access control: Role-based permissions with least-privilege principle
Authentication: Secure session management with token-based authentication
Monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and automated threat detection
Service accounts: Minimal permissions for Cloud Functions and backend services
No client-side secrets: API keys and credentials stored securely in environment variables

international.heading: International data transfers
items: Time 2 Trade is operated from the United States
Data is stored in Google Cloud (Firebase) us-central1 region
For users in the European Economic Area (EEA) and UK: data transfers comply with GDPR via Google Cloud's Standard Contractual Clauses
Firebase services are certified under ISO 27001, SOC 2, and SOC 3
You have the rights outlined in the "Your privacy rights" section above

children.heading: Children's privacy
items: United States: Time 2 Trade is not intended for children under 13 (COPPA compliance)
European Union: Not intended for children under 16 without parental consent (GDPR Article 8)
Age verification: We do not knowingly collect data from children below applicable age limits
Parental requests: If you believe a child has provided data, contact @time2_trade on X (Twitter) for immediate deletion

essential.title: Essential (always active)
items: Authentication tokens to keep you signed in
Session data to maintain app state
Cookie consent preferences
Timezone and language settings

advertising.title: Advertising (optional, requires consent)
items: Google AdSense cookies for ad delivery and measurement
Ad personalization cookies (only when you allow personalized ads)
These are not set when you choose essential-only mode

changes.heading: Changes to this policy
items: We may update this policy to reflect service changes or legal requirements
Last updated date appears at the top of this page
Material changes will be communicated via email to registered users
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy
Previous versions available upon request at @time2_trade on X (Twitter)

contact.heading: Contact us
items: General inquiries: @time2_trade on X (Twitter)
Data requests: DM @time2_trade on X (Twitter) with "Data Request" in message
Response time: We respond to requests within 30 days
Mailing address: Available upon request for formal legal correspondence
